group_1.textRight: I get it...

group_1.textLeft: Funmummufumu funmumu~...
What if they're dead~...@She says.

group_1.textRight: Well, that feels like...that'd be the worst case.

group_1.textLeft: Is that so...

group_1.textRight: That email that Shizuka got yesterday...
That had ta 've been from Iroha's group.

group_1.textLeft: Ahh, that reminds me, I'm certain I heard that@they exchanged contact information.

group_1.textRight: If they were attacked before sendin' it,@well, they're probably alive.
But if it happened after they sent it,@then who knows what happened.

group_1.textLeft: There is broken glass everywhere, so I don't believe@they have come home.

group_1.textRight: We don't know what happened first or second,@so we don't have any clear evidence.
But, well, I gotta feeling they're alive somewhere.
If they're still alive,
we can't deny the possibility that they're still bein'@hunted,
but they're also not goin' back home@after it was raided.

group_1.textLeft: That's true...

group_1.textRight: Or they coulda just forgotten the house key an'@ended up goin' through the window as a punch line.

group_1.textLeft: If it was just a punch line like that, then I will be@forgetting how to be nice.

group_1.textRight: Don't be doin' that.

group_1.textLeft: Then, what shall we do now?
Find out what Miss Tamaki's group is doing?
We could find where they're hiding...

group_1.textRight: Nah, that's fine an' all, but could you do me@a couple of favors?
First is regarding yesterday...@I want you to find out what happened.
I know it's outta the ordinary for us@to rush to the scene,
but we can't be standin' around while things are@moving fast.
Besides, it's about time those eight [textYellow:Kimochi] Stones@came out to play.

group_1.textLeft: I'm afraid they've already appeared...

group_1.textRight: Suppose so.
That's why I want ya investigating what happened@yesterday,
including what happened to all of those@Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: Got it.

group_1.textRight: And 'cause of that, my other request is also@related to it...
But if ya happen ta meet any of the girls@while you're investigating,
take good care of them, will ya?

group_1.textLeft: ...Care, you say?

group_1.textRight: It's times like this when they rely on us,@the Coordinators,
so we need ta appeal ta them.@That's how trustworthy businesses are workin'.

group_1.textLeft: Umm...that's fine, but...
When you say take care of them...@What exactly are we supposed to do?
Fumunmumu?

group_1.textRight: That all depends on the situation.@Even I don't know what's goin' on.
Suppose that means ya gotta look at the big picture@and make your own judgment call.
I'm sure all those memos ya've been takin'@so diligently have gotta be reliable.

group_1.textLeft: You're very right.@Please leave it to me.
Fumumufun...

group_1.textRight: ...But hey, there's one thing ya gotta be@careful about.
While you're investigating, don't be talkin' about@Ryo.

group_1.textLeft: Why is that? Talking about her would move things@along...

group_1.textRight: Because it'll make it look like we found out about@Ryo's death by eavesdropping.

group_1.textLeft: When Miss Tokime received her email,
I had just happened to be there, though...

group_1.textRight: I'm sure they wouldn't feel too happy about us@knowin' the details.
Besides, the death of a friend is a sensitive subject.
A lot of girls won't wanna talk or hear about it.

group_1.textLeft: I see, I will make a memo.

group_1.textRight: Sorry 'bout that.
From where we're standin', the Union tends to be@unhappy with us,
so we have ta leave a good impression...@and be discreet.

group_1.textLeft: Understood.
Now then...the investigation begins anew.

group_1.textRight: Fumu!

group_1.textLeft: First let's make our way to the busy shopping@district.
